channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 13:49 Air alarm in Zaporizhzhia and Zaporizhzhya Territorial Citizen according to further reports.
item.description: 🔴 13:49 Air alarm in Zaporizhzhia and Zaporizhzhya Territorial Citizen according to further reports. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
